titles.title: SF451 Open the eyes of my heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To see you high and lifted up,
shining in the light of your glory.
Pour out your power and love;
as we sing holy, holy, holy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy,
holy, holy, holy,
holy, holy, holy,
I want to see you.

verse.name: c1
